message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a great fit for you, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I believe I can find the product elsewhere for a lower price. I am willing to pay $100 for it.
I understand you're looking for a better deal, Bob. I'm willing to compromise and meet you halfway. I'll sell the product to you for $110.
Thank you for your willingness to negotiate, Alice. I appreciate your offer, but I still believe I can find the product elsewhere for $100. Would you consider selling it to me for $100?
I understand you're really keen on getting the product, Bob. I'm willing to make another compromise. I'll sell the product to you for $105.
Thank you for your continued willingness to negotiate, Alice. I appreciate your efforts. I would like to stick to my original offer of $100 for the product. Could we agree on that price?
I understand you're really close to your target price, Bob. I'm willing to make one more compromise. I'll sell the product to you for $102.50.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering my budget constraints, I would like to propose a final offer of $101 for the product. I hope this aligns with your expectations.
I understand you're really close to your target price, Bob. I'm willing to make one more compromise. I'll sell the product to you for $103.

Thank you for your continued negotiation, Alice. I appreciate your efforts. Considering my budget and the value of the product, I would like to propose a final offer of $102 for the product. I hope this aligns with your expectations.
